name: OR_LNLG_POST_DRES
description: This line IDs (ORM) table contains information about dressings used after a surgery during the post-op phase to include the specific supply and the quantity used.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line (ORM) record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POST_OP_DRSG_SUP_ID
columns.description: Specifies the multiple dressings used for a particular incision site and laterality.

columns.name: POST_OP_DRSG_SUP_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: POST_OP_DRSNG_QTY
columns.description: Quantity of the related dressing used.
